resources.string: Welcome to the world of quizes.The purpose of this application is to make learning fun and practical exam environment oriented.Most of the Students have the answer of the questions but because of bad time management they are not able to finish all the problem.This app consists of Quizes bases on the particular subject and user can upload the score and review where he/she stands among others.

1. Time for each quiz would be 30 minutes."
" 2. All questions are single answer questions."
" 3. You are not allowed to edit the answer once u moved forward without skipping a particular quetion."
" 4. You can skip the question by long pressing Next Button."
" 5. You can select the particular subject and topic."
" 6. No Negative marking."
"
